src:
Ricuh, Massa Demo Depan KPK Bakar Traffic Cone-Dorong Polisi
06 Nov 2019, 15:11 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Massa yang menamakan diri Gerakan Masyarakat Bawah Indonesia (GMBI) melakukan aksi unjuk rasa di depan gedung KPK. Massa mulai membakar traffic cone dan terlibat aksi saling dorong dengan polisi.
Pantaun detikcom, massa melakukan aksi di depan gedung KPK Jl Kuningan Persada, Jakarta Selatan, Rabu (6/11/2019). Massa GMBI mulai mendekat ke area teras gedung KPK.


Foto: Ricuh demo depan KPK (Ibnu-detikcom)

Mereka mulai membakar traffic cone atau kerucut jalan yang berada di depan KPK. Massa GMBI kemudian mendekat ke area teras gedung KPK. Mereka terlihat naik ke atas pagar gedung KPK.
Polisi langsung membentuk barikade untuk menghalau massa yang coba masuk ke dalam gedung KPK.Massa dan polisi pun terlibat saling dorong.
Massa kemudian dipukul mundur ke area jalan depan KPK. Kini massa GMBI masih melalukan aksi di depan KPK.

(ibh/haf)
text:
Ricuh, Mass Demonstration Home KPK Burn Traffic Cone-Push the Police
Nov 6 2019, 15:11 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - The masses calling themselves the Indonesian Lower Community Movement (GMBI) held a demonstration in front of the KPK building. The masses began to burn traffic cones and were involved in pushing each other with the police.
Pantaun detikcom, a mass took action in front of the KPK building Jl Kuningan Persada, South Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). GMBI masses began to approach the terrace area of the KPK building.


Photo: Ricuh demo before KPK (Ibnu-detikcom)

They began to burn traffic cones or road cones in front of the KPK. The GMBI mass then approached the patio area of the KPK building. They were seen climbing to the top of the KPK building fence.
The police immediately formed a barricade to keep out the masses who tried to enter the KPK building. Mass and the police were also involved pushing each other.
The mob was then beaten back to the area in front of the KPK. Now the GMBI masses are still carrying out actions in front of the KPK.

(ibh / haf)
